lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I like to see what entrepreneurism on a local level can do to improve the lives of ordinary people trying to accomplish extraordinary things.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the operational (day-to-day) functions of a busy sales company, which sells medical devices to surgeons across the state of Tennessee.

lender.name: Deb
lender.loan_because: it's an opportunity to look beyond myself & invest in the lives of others.

lender.name: Sandy@ Bangkok
lender.loan_because: I believe my small contribution can make a difference to somone on the other end of world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Business Development Manager for a Executive Search Firm.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I have funds to help those in need so I need to share what I have with others to make a difference in the world.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I want to help people directly. I give a lot through charities, but it is neat to be able to select individuals based on their own needs and aspirations!

lender.name: Rebekah
lender.loan_because: I feel it is my responsibility. I have been blessed with many things and I live in a wonderful country - it is my duty to the world while I live in it, to share this bounty with others. I am interested in educating children first and foremost, and also in helping women develop strength, fortitude and self-esteem by learning to help themselves. I am currently engaged in several charitable projects around the world inspired by my many travels abroad. The people are my greatest joy as I am welcomed in so many corners of the world - it is from them that I learn so much.
lender.occupational_info: In its very simplest form....I assist companies in the oil & gas industry who are struggling with a business problem to resolve their issues, move forward and be successful

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: Makes life worth living when we can help others.

lender.name: LeAnn
lender.loan_because: I am grateful to be given the chance to share my blessings in helping another person to achieve his or her goals.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: If my small loan helps someone realize their goals and dreams quicker, I am more than happy to help. My offering may be small and might seem like a drop in the bucket, but even loose change eventually adds up in the bottom of your purse!

lender.name: clare
lender.loan_because: because i can and i care what happens to people.

lender.name: Tracey
lender.loan_because: I understand what it is like to struggle to provide for your family,and I love to give to others and this is a brillant way to help many people in a small way.

lender.name: Dotti & Bill
lender.loan_because: It encourages self help which teaches people to improve themselves and their situations, which can be long lasting.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired person who teaches English to immigrants who come to the USA. My wife is a nurse for premature babies.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: i believe it important to share our fortunes with others, and to be compassionate, aware, and active. we in america tend towards selfish behavior and need to expand our vision.
lender.occupational_info: i design and plant gardens to beautify, ensure our appreciation of nature, and remind us of what is important. i use my body to the best of its ability, digging holes, moving stone, planting trees, etc., which makes me feel connected to the earth, history, human beings around the world. i like to, at the end of the day, consider that i have used my body, mind, and heart well in all that i do, with tired muscles to prove it.

lender.name: Georgi
lender.loan_because: the better or your neighbor is the better of your are
lender.occupational_info: I'm an engineer

lender.name: Marlene & Bob
lender.loan_because: Our daughter educated us about this opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: We used to work in Personnel Administration but we are retired now.

lender.name: Julian Rogier Matthijs
lender.loan_because: we feel good about these projects!
lender.occupational_info: Playing!!!! All day we are playing ;0)

lender.name: LINDA PACULA
lender.loan_because: My beloved Ukrainian Father and Mother-in-Laws came to American with nothing but determination to work hard to make a good life for their family. They did. Very few people helped them. They earned everything they have by working hard. Three years after they were in this country, there was an opportunity to take over a business in a small town nearby when the owner was unexpectedly killed and the widow offered my Father-in-law to buy a little store. He jumped at the chance to have something of his own and soon turned it into a butcher shop and began making his our sausage...something he knew from the old country. They were open 7 days a week, 7 am - 7 pm. They raised two sons. I married the oldest and we had two sons who grew up in the meat business. Dido and Baba Pacula did the family proud. Baba can still be found in the store ..85 years young, greetings customers and giving cooking advise. I loan in memory of my Father-in-Law, Walter Pacula.
lender.occupational_info: Now I've retired from being the 'best wiener twister in Winesburg'. I take care of the bookkeeping needs for our two meat businesses.

lender.name: Duane
lender.loan_because: I live with my wife and daughter at my perants place in a small room as the company i was with closed down
lender.occupational_info: Hello to all i live in South Africa and do computer repairs when i can im looking to regester a bussines and purchase a car so i can get to customers i love my line of work

lender.name: Charlotte
lender.loan_because: I work with students from the countries Kiva helps.
lender.occupational_info: I help teachers and students at a University.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I like to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a food store, I collect the money for the company I work for when the people want to pay for groceries.

lender.name: Johnny T.
lender.loan_because: I AM
lender.occupational_info: Hmmm, well check out my website link

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: time to give
lender.occupational_info: I take care of children from 0 to 4 years old, while their parents are at work.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: it is good to give!
lender.occupational_info: I work in the civil engineering field. I love my job and the people who I work with.

lender.name: Anastasia
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a pre-med student studying Biology and Classical Studies.

lender.name: The Essence of Eve
lender.loan_because: I am a blessed mother of four and a successful entrepreneur. My business has enhanced my life and the lives of my children in countless ways. Through my business and with the help of my customers, we have a chance to help other mothers succeed!
lender.occupational_info: I make and sell handmade items for women and children. Many of our products are purchased by families concerned about the environment and help reduce the amount of waste and chemicals returned to the earth.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: "There is no higher religion than human service. To work for the common good is the greatest creed." - Woodrow Wilson

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: I can and because it will help.

lender.name: Seth
lender.loan_because: One gives freely, yet grows all the richer; another withholds what he should give, and only suffers want. - Proverbs 11:24
lender.occupational_info: But you shall receive power when the Holy Spirit comes upon you, and you shall be My witnesses in Jerusalem and all Judea and Samaria and to the ends of the earth. - Acts 1:8

lender.name: RoJAM
lender.occupational_info: The 5th National Romanian Scout Jamboree is focusing on the education for sustainable development. We hope that by contributing to Kiva we "practice a little what we preach" and make a difference in the life of someone thousands of kilometers away...

lender.name: Judy & Ron
lender.loan_because: We strongly believe in helping people who are prepared to help themselves. For a change we are investing in humanity.
lender.occupational_info: 40 years in the natural gas business. Our kids have grown and are successful musicians,

lender.name: Eivor
lender.loan_because: We are all her to help each other, to a better life, if we can.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I believe this is one of the best ways to help people raise their own living conditions, and shows that we all live in the same world.

lender.name: Lee
lender.loan_because: I'm glad to be helping those in need. Plus its great to know that its 99.9% likely that I'll be able to keep recycling those funds to new opportunities.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a music marketing and distribution company, the Home Grown Music Network and a record label, www.HarmonizedRecords.com

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I want to help people have more control over their own lives.
lender.occupational_info: I write programs to make web sites do things.

lender.name: SH Watson Family
lender.loan_because: We believe that economic stability can lead to a more peaceful world.

lender.name: Norma
lender.loan_because: I am a human being.
lender.occupational_info: Empowering young women, ages 12-21, who have experienced commercial sexual exploitation and domestic trafficking to exit the commercial sex industry and develop to their full potential.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: it feels nicer than giving it to the bankers. ;-)

lender.name: Elisa
lender.loan_because: The ancient latins said "per aspera ad astra": it means that through difficulties you can reach the stars!

lender.name: Quad Cities Rotary Club
lender.loan_because: We loan because we believe in the advancement of international understanding, goodwill and peace through economic opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: We provide a means for community and international service.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: it's rewarding to be able to help and, when one is able, it's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Leena
lender.loan_because: My life has been blessed in so many ways that it is equally important for me to give back to others in order to improve their life in any small way I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a medical device company to develop and market new products for patients with orthopedic related injuries

lender.name: Christine Joy
lender.loan_because: I have to share and be a blessing to people who are in need and are doing their best to improve their lives. Plus, it makes me feel good that I have been a part in making a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I sell medicines that will improve patients' health and help them enjoy their lives better and healthier.

lender.name: Hippie John
lender.occupational_info:
I own a small restaurant in Houston, Texas with my partner Susan Ralph. Please come by and say howdy if you are in the neighborhood.
Thanks!
john

lender.name: James Colin
lender.loan_because: My son recommended this as a way of helping the less well off people in the world.
lender.occupational_info: Retired.

lender.name: VeNicia
lender.loan_because: I'd like to think it will bring hope to someone's life knowing there are people cheering for them across the world!
lender.occupational_info: I teach 2nd grade children (7-8 years old) and love it.

lender.name: Jorn Terje
lender.loan_because: I think this is a good way to give people the opportunity to get their own business started

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I am very greatful for the things and opportunities I've been given in my life and I'd like to share those things and opportunities with people who are struggling to make their way under less fortunate circumstances.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an organization that provides remote technical support to various retail partners.

lender.name: Agri Finance Foundation
lender.loan_because: SMEs and Agriculture are important drivers for economic development and fighting poverty.
lender.occupational_info: Agricultural lending for the South

lender.name: Career Explorer
lender.loan_because: Our core philosophy is to aid people to make a better future for themselves. The Career Explorer team provides information and opportunities about career education and training to those who want to find a new path in life.
lender.occupational_info: The Career Explorer site has an aptitude test and career education information to help people find career training that suits their skills.

lender.name: Technical Schools Guide
lender.loan_because: At Technical Schools Guide we like to lend on Kiva because we believe in helping others achieve their best future.
lender.occupational_info: Our Technical-Schools-Guide.com site proudly offers an ever-expanding list of technical classes and technical degree programs, from graphic design to computer programming. We assist people in their journey for a Technical School.

lender.name: Thubten
lender.loan_because: Like so many other things that I enjoy doing, I do it because it feels good.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a full-time writer and editor and part-time English teacher and yoga instructor.

lender.name: Allen & Karen
lender.loan_because: We are all connected; "everything that lives, is holy."
lender.occupational_info: Allen is a retired college teacher; Karen teaches in an elementary school.

lender.name: Carmen
lender.loan_because: I believe in entrepreneurship. I try to do my part by helping small businesses, be it by providing low cost marketing or lending through KIVA.
lender.occupational_info:
I create marketing campaigns for businesses using print, web, social media, webinars and live seminars.
Connect with me: -Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/carmen.larreynaga -Twitter - http://twitter.com/CarmenACDS -LinkedIn- http://www.linkedin.com/in/carmenlarreynaga

lender.name: Career College Central
lender.loan_because: We want to help people change their futures whether its through providing information to the Career College Sector of Higher Education or lending to those starting new ventures to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: The CareerCollegeCentral.com team offers industry news, information and resources on how to effectively run a world-class educational institution. This includes subjects like admissions issues, regulatory issues, training, marketing and much more.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: The Internet is eliminating the barriers between compassion and need. Mt. 25:40
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that makes and sells toys throughout the world. My job is to sell them to parents of American children who want to buy toys directly from the factory. We do this using the Internet.

lender.name: Steffen
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Liam
lender.loan_because: I want to help people.

lender.name: Conrad
lender.loan_because: I don't know why I loan. Maybe it's because since I have learned I don't really have a great need for material things, except for the real necessities in life, I felt wealthier in spirit. I only feel it is imperative that I spread this joyous feeling to people around the world, those who are fueled only by their passion and trust in their practical ideas.
lender.occupational_info: I am an actor, writer, producer, and director. Though that may sound glamorous to a lot of people I meet, at the core, I am merely an artist. I have the same issues, problems, and rewards very similar to any entrepreneurs around the world. I deal with my craft, I create a product, and I sell and distribute my wares to make a living. Some people market durable goods. I market durable stories and, hopefully, eternal moments of enlightenment.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: Give a man a fish, he eats for a day. Invest a little start up dough in his business...

lender.name: Kurt
lender.loan_because: It's exciting when many small investors pool their money for loans to people economically disadvantaged.
lender.occupational_info: Operation's supervisor for a large theater where plays and music events are performed.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I believe in these programs.

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because: I like reminders that people are trustworthy - it helps me believe in people despite what I read in the newspaper.

lender.name: Stu and Agnes
lender.loan_because: We are formerly entrepreneurs ourselves and have been helped by others when we started our own business, many years ago.
lender.occupational_info: Our business was electrical construction and repairs for industrial companies.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I firmly believe that this is the best way to help entrepreneurs in developing countries realize their dreams, support their families, and boost their countries' economies.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a recent college graduate working at a TV station called Current TV. I'm responsible for helping and moderating Current TV's internet community.

lender.name: Francis
lender.occupation: Retired Fire Chief of Collingwood Ontario
lender.loan_because: I wish to help others to improve their self respect and worth. I admire all who strive to improve their social and financial status when the journey seems impossible.

lender.name: Bev
lender.loan_because: its important to help each other succeed. Small businesses are key to keeping local flavors.
lender.occupational_info: Graphic designer/ magazine publisher

lender.name: Isabel and Michael
lender.loan_because: My husband and I love people! I come from a third world country, El Salvador and I know how how difficult it is to be successful if you do not have the means. Now we have the means so why not help someone out!!!
lender.occupational_info: We both work office jobs (very boreing!) in New York City.

lender.name: Jones Family
lender.loan_because:
It is a great way to allow people to help themselves. I admire how hard they work.
My three children are 6,9, and 10 years old are donating some of their allowance and learning about the free market economy. It is a great way to teach about the value of money.
lender.occupational_info: I sell airplanes.

lender.name: Frances
lender.loan_because: we are all in this together.

lender.name: Tim Seibert
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who strive to better themselves and their families.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a fair chance to realize their dreams, put food on the table and support their families.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an electric utility company and help the company plan for new infrastructure to bring power (including renewable energy) to people's homes and businesses.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people that are trying to help themselves. While in the Navy I participated in several humanitarian medical missions. The people we provided medical care to were very greatfull, those of us that participated appreciated their graditude. It was in the navy that I developed the need and willingness to help people that are trying to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I assist physicians in surgery by preparing instrument trays, setting up the surgical suite and passing instruments. My hobbies include fishing and traveling. This picture was taken in Montero, Bolivia South America - June 2007

lender.name: Lee
lender.loan_because: "Freely you have received, freely give." - Matthew 10:8 "To whom much is given, much is expected". - Luke 12:48
lender.occupational_info: I work in the Sales department of a multinational electronic component manufacturing company in southern California.

lender.name: Karin
lender.loan_because: I have travelled all over the world and have been shocked at how little opportunity is given to hard-working, honest individuals in poorer countries.
lender.occupational_info: I help technology companies make good decisions.

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: I got a gift certificate for a Chanukah gift from a wonderful friend.
lender.occupational_info: Iwork with children from age 3 to age 13, teaching them to read, write, and do math. They love creative activities that develop their hearts and minds.

lender.name: Aashish
lender.loan_because: It is a sustainable model of giving.

lender.name: Garland Family
lender.loan_because: We want to help others, especially in countries where their income is so low and their opportunity is so poor.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I feel so fortunate to be able to help people through my job as a physical therapist. With Kiva, I hope to make a difference on a larger scale.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I can and I should. I have been self employed since 2002 and have been fortunate enough to have help along the way. This is my way of returning the favor.
lender.occupational_info: I am the owner of a small business doing custom invitations and graphic design.

lender.name: Eva
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of a small act.
lender.occupational_info: I help scientists get the money they need to do their research.

lender.name: Canadian Angels
lender.loan_because:
We want to help break the cycle of poverty by sharing our good fortune with those who are striving to help themselves.
Mahatma Gandhi once said "the planet provides enough to fill each person's need but not each person's greed."
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of Canadian Bankers helping people in financial distress due to job loss, seasonal employment, etc. manage their money in order to make timely payments and maintain a healthy standard of living.

lender.name: Darwin
lender.loan_because: I'm blessed with privileges and I believe all people deserve a chance to make it on their own.
lender.occupational_info: I photograph landscapes and nature, like beaches, sunsets, mountains and animals, and I sell my work as framed and unframed prints, cards and calendars.

lender.name: Alice
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at the University of Texas in Austin.

lender.name: Feniece
lender.loan_because: I want to help people with their dreams and goals in life.
lender.occupational_info: Lots of customer service!

lender.name: Michael-Philippe
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a little help to move forward I know I did and it made me who I am today
lender.occupational_info: I am a personal chef for a very wealth family and I see how they impact the world in a positive way every day

lender.name: Alice
lender.loan_because: I want to help people move forward
lender.occupational_info: Set up laboratory equipment and train staff for doctor ordered lab tests

lender.name: Carlos
lender.occupational_info: Mathematics and computers!

lender.name: Camile
lender.loan_because: I would like to see someone pull out of their poverty ,make it and quite possibly help someone else do the same.
lender.occupational_info: My major portfolio is in mortgages by trying to make it work for them and within their budgets.

lender.name: Guillaume
lender.loan_because: I care about others on the planet and I want to make a difference in their lives.

lender.name: Dwight Siman
lender.loan_because: I strongly believe in this vision to help people help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I am the Executive Director of Sales for Vbine Energy ( 5 kw vertical axis wind turbine )

lender.name: Suzie Hammond
lender.loan_because: I have been to some of these countries and know how hard they work, how much they love their children and how ceaselessly they strive for better more comfortable lives. If I can help that I will.
lender.occupational_info: I use words on paper to try and help people to better their lives.

lender.name: Bismark
lender.loan_because: I want to pay it forward. I also believe that the only way to help others deal with poverty is to help them establish something that they can depend on continuously. And, of course, entrepreneurship is the vehicle that will make it feasible.
lender.occupational_info: Bismark Ampofo runs www.free-home-based-business-info.com the site that provides you with the quality of free information you need to start your internet based home business on the right path... including in depth home based business reviews.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I see a world without borders. I believe we are a global community.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: I love to see my money contributing to something good in the world, rather than contributing to the profits of some multi-national conglomerate.
lender.occupational_info: I develop and deliver training for credit union employees and for credit union members.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I am fascinated with the idea of so easily impacting someone else's life on the other side of the world
lender.occupational_info: I help business owners run their businesses more efficiently.

lender.name: Dina
lender.loan_because: Teach them to fish and loan them money to buy a rod.

lender.name: Abel and Laura
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference.

lender.name: Jodi
lender.loan_because: we wouldn't be where we are today had someone not given us a loan....and because its fun!
lender.occupational_info: I am raising 4 children, helping my husband run a farm and running a program in my home to help women with disabilities learn life skills.

lender.name: Leonardo
lender.loan_because: I want the world to conspire to prove human beings are inherently honest, not inherently greedy.

lender.name: Jean
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in other people's lives

lender.name: Jan & Bill
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of micro finance. Kiva does an incredible job of showing who I'm lending to as well as who the other lenders are. The way Kiva works is just so amazing. It makes the world a smaller, friendlier place.

lender.name: Garrett
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.loan_because: Believe that women are the key to improving life in struggling communities

lender.name: Sharon and Mary
lender.loan_because: Idea of Kiva came from a relative. Great idea to help others less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: Crazy! 1600 kids under one roof throughout the course of a school day! There is never the same day twice! I love it!

lender.loan_because: hi i'm lookin for a loan for my studies it comes upto $40,000 , pl help me
lender.occupational_info: its a pilot training course

lender.name: Cindy Henderson
lender.loan_because: What they have created is so incredible. It is brilliant.
lender.occupational_info: I don't make much money but what I do have I want to share.

lender.name: Amy

lender.occupational_info: I help companies who are not doing well.

lender.loan_because: Best use of $25 I have seen.
lender.occupational_info: I edit hunting and fishing shows for television.

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: I am aware of the good work my small donation can do. I want to spread this goodness to the less fortunate whom I do not know.
lender.occupational_info: I visit sick people in the hospital and take care of their needs, especially spiritual. I pray with them and help them in other ways.

lender.name: Lee
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance

lender.loan_because: I hope my support will help others make a better life for themselves and their families. J'espre que mon prt aidera d'autres personnes se construire un meilleur avenir.

lender.name: Moira
lender.loan_because: I have always considered myself fortunate, and I believe in sharing fortune.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a recent college graduate. I work for a business consulting company.

lender.name: MartinCSI
lender.loan_because: We have profits from our own business and believe everyone should have an opportunity to be successful.
lender.occupational_info: We design and program electrical control systems for the manufacturing industry in the United States.

lender.name: Andres
lender.loan_because: It is a noble way to contribute to the revitalization of small businesses in a global economy and promotes the development of entrepreneurs who have the passion for running a business but lack the funds to take it to the next level.
lender.occupational_info: I am a marketing management professional with an interest in global economies and the development of the small business sector.

lender.name: US College Search
lender.loan_because: Our desire is to see people make a fresh start in life, to continue in the success they have had and achieve their long term dreams. We want to be a lender on this site to extend our mission to people around the world and make a difference in places its really needed.
lender.occupational_info: The U.S. College Search group strives to be a quality resource for high school students, parents and anyone looking to go back to college. Our database contains thousands of 4-year universities, 2-year colleges, junior colleges, vocational schools, job training programs, technical certification programs and online degree programs.

lender.name: Manjula
lender.loan_because: The stories are so touching.

lender.name: Beauty School
lender.loan_because: We love to aid people in taking care of themselves and others through skin and hair care training. In the same way we desire to assist people through this website to take care of their needs and the needs of others in their care. What a great site this is!
lender.occupational_info: BeautySchool.com is the Internet's only comprehensive directory of Licensed Beauty Schools and Colleges from all over the world. We connect people with the right training to get them on the way to a thriving career in the beauty industry.

lender.name: Laurie
lender.loan_because: I know that being an entrepreneur is hard work and it's nice to have a little help. I am moved by those who have the courage to take control of their lives and rise above poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I help people build community and learn about self-sufficient and sustainable living.

lender.name: Andre
lender.loan_because: it is a sustainable and constructive way of helping others
lender.occupational_info: I work developing electronic systems that make automotive engines work

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I feel very lucky that as a business person who has grown up in America with many opportunities, that I help others make their lives better.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I can. I have been blessed with many things in my life and want to share my blessings.

lender.name: linda
lender.loan_because: God leads me to help others.

lender.name: Terrisa
lender.loan_because: I believe that the world will change if everyone could just "pay it forward" compassion heals everything. "Love thy neighbor as thyself" That is the whole meaning of the Torah, Bible...
lender.occupational_info: I am a part time Real Estate Broker but a full time Admin/Office Manager. I take care of all the paper work involved in a transaction. I am Married with 5 children. I live in Dundee, Oregon.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I'm really lucky that I can help other people.
lender.occupational_info: I help biotechnology companies bring new products to market.

lender.name: teresa
lender.loan_because: I traveled and lived in many parts of the world when I was young and will always appreciate the wonderful hospitality and friendship shown to me. I believe such contacts bring greater understanding and improve prospects for peace in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist with a very varied background in oil painting, water colors, fabric design, graphics and computer graphics.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: This is an extraordinary opportunity to help people in need around the world.

lender.name: Lori K.
lender.loan_because: "One of the secrets of life is that all that is really worth the doing is what we do for others." -- Lewis Carroll

lender.name: Tanya
lender.loan_because: It feels good...

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: it feels good to be able to help another woman with her business.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: It's how I can help.
lender.occupational_info: Registered Nurse at a local Nursing home

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I believe little things can make big differences to many people in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work in tourism helping people experience the world in a respectful, thoughtful way.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: a little can go a long way.. :)

lender.name: Christian and Janelle
lender.loan_because: Kiva is one of the best ways to empower and assist people on a truly global scale. It is amazing the lives that can be touched.

lender.name: Adrian Rehn
lender.loan_because: I am a current college student who wants to raise the standard of living in areas that aren't as developed as the rest of the Western world.

lender.name: Paula
lender.loan_because: I want to help others achieve their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I test computer software to make sure it works and to see if I can break it.

lender.name: devon
lender.loan_because: i think it is one way to make the world a better place. it doesn't take much to change the life of someone - and many people - across the world and have a lasting impact with kiva. it is a reliable, easy, and informative micro-credit loan process between the lenders, the local chapters, and the entrepreneurs needing loans to expand or improve their businesses.

lender.name: Rob (Sybre & Juna)
lender.loan_because:
- People matter. People know best what is best for them. Microcredit directly helps people and not governments or other organizations.
- My children should learn how they should both respect and help other people. This is a great way to involve them.
lender.occupational_info: Consultant on water management and regional governmental issues.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: It sounds like a great way to make a big difference in someone's life for the price of going to a movie. I hope it'll also turn into a fun hobby as I track and reinvest my loans. I also hope I get to see the how these loans help people succeed and improve the lives of their families and everyone else in their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I help government communicate clearly and openly with citizens. The better citizens understand what governments do with their money, the better they'll be able to hold those same governments to account.

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: real estate development

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: The heart says yes!
lender.occupational_info: I'm semi retired but voluteer with a non-profit org.and write for fun

lender.name: Ralph & Jenny
lender.loan_because: Actions speak louder than words*giving back is a wonderful feeling*People helping people* Microfinance is an opportunity to help people at poverty levels rise above their current situation and chase their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I am a real estate agent in the Central Florida area with Stirling Sotheby's International Realty . A portion of sale proceeds are sent to Kiva in order to help others with their businesses. My husband, Ralph, is a database analyst. We've been together for 10 years and have helped each other accomplish many goals. Together, we want to help others with theirs.

lender.name: Hana
lender.loan_because: I can! And I think most of us can and should. When you think how a relatively small amount to us, for someone else can be such a big change!
lender.occupational_info: Architect: I design buildings.

lender.name: Egmont
lender.loan_because: They will be happy
lender.occupational_info: leading people

lender.name: Tristan
lender.loan_because: A little bit can go a long way.
lender.occupational_info: I draw. I build websites.

lender.name: Micro T
lender.loan_because: I believe in Microlending and in helping people. My father's family comes from a similar background as some of these entrepeneurs and I've seen the struggles with my own eyes.
lender.occupational_info: I Help People. Thats what I've been put on this planet to do. Somedays I wonder why I didn't choose a different career path.

lender.name: Maureen
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel that I can make a small difference in the life of one person on the other side of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help my clients save money by reveiwing their real estate.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.occupational_info: I meet with young people who don't have family to support them and help them to sort out problems they may have in their life.

lender.name: Kostas
lender.loan_because: I like the idea :-)

lender.name: Hillcrest Outreach
lender.loan_because: we believe in the words of Jesus Christ, who reminds us that "I tell you the truth, whatever you did for one of the least of these brothers of mine, you did for me. (Matthew 25:40)
lender.occupational_info: Hillcrest United Church of Christ is a progressive Christian community that practices inclusiveness of all people regardless of race, age, gender, nationality, political view or sexual orientation.

lender.name: Logan Graham
lender.loan_because: It feels good to know that someone else out there is feeling good because of it.

lender.name: Abigail
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I am a molecular biologist working on the mechanisms of gene transcription in mammalian cells.

lender.name: tateandwill
lender.loan_because: we care

lender.name: Gayle
lender.loan_because: I want to pass along the break that was given to me.
lender.occupational_info: I worked very hard for 32 years, and now I enjoy my family and leisure. I hope I can help someone else enjoy what I now have.

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: I can help a little.
lender.occupational_info: I broker and service real estate loans between lenders and borrowers.

lender.name: Janusz
lender.loan_because: Because the world can be a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I develop open-source web based software to help companies manage their business.

lender.name: Moira
lender.loan_because: My family is very lucky to live in Canada, and we wanted to help others in a very personal way. We wanted to give to people who are trying to make a better life for themselves and empower them to be independent.
lender.occupational_info: I am a doctor in Canada

lender.name: Jacob
lender.loan_because: I feel that my money is needed elsewhere more than here.

lender.name: Stef
lender.loan_because: why not?
lender.occupational_info: I am super blessed to work with 30 students aging from 11-18 years old. Along with our amazing volunteers, we have a tight knit community of believers.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to fulfill their dreams!

lender.name: Madeline
lender.loan_because: It is good to help people who are helping themselves.

lender.name: Keisha
lender.occupational_info: I help US Army servicemembers register for college courses.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: I want the world to be a better, more equitable place.
lender.occupational_info: I raise money to help fight cancer.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: it costs me so little to do so much.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a very big building where I'm one of thousands. I help people with their needs and I love what I do.

lender.name: Gerhardt
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have the opportunity to achieve what they want in this world.

lender.name: cynthia
lender.loan_because: Every little bit counts.

lender.name: Kelley & Spike
lender.loan_because: "Paying it forward" is what life is all about!

lender.name: Cory
lender.loan_because: This organization is awesome! I love the fact that KIVA is giving entrepreneurs around the world a chance to provide for themselves, and for their families. Viva Kiva!

lender.name: Star
lender.loan_because: I like to help other women.
lender.occupational_info: I use the computer to design advertising.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be in a position to help a little bit.

lender.occupational_info: I have been a banker and businessman prior to my retirement.

lender.name: Bekah
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: it is very fun to be a kid

lender.name: Jaroslav
lender.loan_because: I realize that not everyone is as fortunate as I am.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a software product release. This means that I oversee R&D, testing, documentation, and manufacturing for our software. My background is as a computer scientist, and I enjoy working in the software industry.

lender.name: janice
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the lives of people who want to make a difference. I also want my kids to experience "giving back".
lender.occupational_info: I am the mother of four children and I work part time as an accountant at a bank. I am responsible for the bank's financial accuracy.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: We are all linked. When any individual person succeeds, we all succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I write books about history.

lender.loan_because: I believe that helping people help themselves is the best way forward.
lender.occupational_info: I do research into quality control machines for agriculture and the food industry, especially ones that use cameras. Most of my work is writing computer programs for these.

lender.loan_because: Para ajudar colegas como eu, que esto necesitando de dinheiro rpido!
lender.occupational_info: Consertos em motores de eletrodosticos, maquinas industriais. Empresas que fazem este tipo de servio no se encontra onde quero montar a loja! Dia 13 de fevereiro, quarta-feira que vem, irei alugar o ponto comercial, mas estou necessitando de dinheiro.
